tome.name: Tome of Mystery Pin
tome.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Black Cherry, Muted Rose, True Black
tome.characteristics:
Height: 30 mm Wide: 19.3 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
tome.buffs: This heavy tome, most certainly magical and likely powerful, is locked, and no key was found to open it. Whoever wrote it, they made sure to protect its secrets… or were they protecting you from whatever is hidden within? Could also be a mimic or an innocent cookbook! Who knows. You might be the first in centuries to see its pages. Either way, good luck with this one!

yellowPotion.name: Potion of Concentration Pin
yellowPotion.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Lavender Gray, Muted Rose, Golden Orange, Pastel Yellow
yellowPotion.characteristics:
Height: 20 mm Wide: 13.4 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
yellowPotion.buffs: This shiny liquid in a slightly pointed bottle is said to sharpen your mind and help you focus on whatever task you need to do. It catches your eye and somehow keeps regaining your attention after you get distracted by something else. I’ve heard that nine out of ten elven mages recommend it. It also tastes good!

redPotion.name: Health potion Pin
redPotion.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Lavender Gray, Muted Rose, Black Cherry, Primary Red
redPotion.characteristics:
Height: 20 mm Wide: 13.5 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
redPotion.buffs: HP potion, a staple item of any adventurer’s pack. An absolute necessity for those who don’t run from danger, and a chance for those who have to. The essence of life itself, packaged in best-quality, lightweight, hit-resistant reusable glass vial. Refillable at any good-aligned god temple. A classic.

bluePotion.name: Mana potion Pin
bluePotion.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Lavender Gray, Muted Rose, Sky Blue, Royal Blue
bluePotion.characteristics:
Height: 20 mm Wide: 12.1 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
bluePotion.buffs: Helps tired casters to quickly replenish their powers and is an adventurer’s best friend in many various situations that drain your energy. It does not really have any particular flavour but it is always pleasantly cold. The very colour of it gives you a sense of calm and confidence. A total must have!

potionSet.name: Potion Set 3 Pins
potionSet.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Lavender Gray, Muted Rose, Black Cherry, Primary Red, Golden Orange, Pastel Yellow, Sky Blue, Royal Blue
potionSet.characteristics:
Height: 20 mm Wide: 13.5 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
potionSet.buffs:
A set of three potions designed to solve most of a typical adventurer’s problems. The set includes:
- Health potion
- Mana potion
- Concentration potion
Neatly packed and easy to carry in your inventory. Useful in a variety of situations. Refillable if you keep the bottles after use. A great option for those who like to be prepared!

dagger.name: Dagger +1 Pin
dagger.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Black Cherry, Muted Rose, True Black
dagger.characteristics:
Height: 50 mm Wide: 18.1 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
dagger.buffs: A true and reliable weapon. Daggers come in all shapes and sizes, some made to impress, others - to be concealed. This particular one is versatile: while small and easy to hide, it is well-balanced and beautifully designed. It’s charmed to shine in the dark should you need it to, and to not reflect a single ray of light when you want it hidden. Could also serve as a sword to smaller sized adventurers, especially those travelling towards a mountain. A good choice.

sword.name: Small sword Pin
sword.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Black Cherry, Muted Rose, True Black
sword.characteristics:
Height: 80 mm Wide: 23.8 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
sword.buffs: Despite the name, there’s nothing smaller about this noble weapon. It has a sharp and striking beauty of a shard of ice in sunlight, and it was made with artistry and skill to satisfy a hero’s needs in battles. For those who are in need of protection and those who dare to protect. For those who stand up to danger. May it serve you well.

guitar.name: Bard’s heart Pin
guitar.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised
Enamel: Black Cherry, Muted Rose, True Black
guitar.characteristics:
Height: 50 mm Wide: 23.8 mm
Fastening: Butterfly clutch
guitar.buffs: Lutes, mandolins, guitars - for bards these aren’t mere instruments. They are the heart and soul, the pain and joy, the one best friend and the one true love. They cry and sing for you, revealing lies of the world and uncovering truths of poets’ minds.

toteBag1.name: The Inventory Tote Bag
toteBag1.characteristics:
Height: 39 cm Wide: 34cm
Tape Type: Double Handle
toteBag1.buffs: Legends say that a true hero or chosen one is easily recognized. But it is not shiny halo of glory that reveals their true nature. It’s the Inventory. Invisible backpacks, bags, bottomless pockets, suspicious holes at the back of their shirts - all doors leading to a secret dimension where innumerable pieces of loot are kept, safe and unseen from the outside. Do you have your own? Would you like to?

toteBag2.name: The Inventory Tote Bag
toteBag2.buffs:
Legends say that a true hero or chosen one is easily recognized. But it is not shiny halo of glory that reveals their true nature. It’s the Inventory. Invisible backpacks, bags, bottomless pockets, suspicious holes at the back of their shirts - all doors leading to a secret dimension where innumerable pieces of loot are kept, safe and unseen from the outside. Do you have your own? Would you like to?

Now also in black.
